title: John Haggan
text: John Haggan (16 December 1896 – June 1982) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="wing%20half">wing half</a> who played in <a href="the%20Football%20League">the Football League</a> for <a href="Brentford%20F.C.">Brentford</a> and <a href="Sunderland%20A.F.C.">Sunderland</a>.
